meanings.definition: To increase the volume or fullness of something, especially hair.
meanings.sent1: She volumizes her hair with a special shampoo.
meanings.sent2: The new hair product volumizes thin hair effectively.
meanings.sent3: The magical shampoo volumizes her hair so much, she almost hit the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter volumizes the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The stylist volumizes her hair, transforming it into a beautiful mane.

meanings.definition: To make something appear larger or more substantial.
meanings.sent1: The artist volumizes the painting to make it more striking.
meanings.sent2: The camera angle volumizes the landscape, making it seem grand.
meanings.sent3: His storytelling skills volumize the fish he caught, turning it into a legendary tale.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence volumizes her presence in the room, making her stand out.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret ingredient volumizes the flavor of the dish, making it unforgettable.
